message:
"Heroes In Blue"

Uniformed angels, unheralded in tales,
Teardrops in ink, their valor sheer delight.
In tweets turned thorns, truth ever prevails.
prompt: ‘I’ve had death threats’: Real Happy Valley writer vilified in tweets by police When Alice Vinten wrote The Real Happy Valley, she intended the book to be a celebration of women in the police force, the real-life accounts of those who served as inspiration for protagonist Sgt Catherine Cawood in Sally Wainwright’s acclaimed BBC drama.
